medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began at home, included nausea and emesis, which resolved upon arrival to the ICU. The patient reported intermittent tachycardia and hypotension before treatment with IV fluids, leading to improvement.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension (HTN), Chronic Kidney Disease (CKD), Atrial Fibrillation (AF), Kidney Stones.
medical_history.family_history: Family history of hypertension and kidney disease.
